head.title: REUTERS TO PROCEED WITH INSTINET SALE

hedline.hl1: REUTERS TO PROCEED WITH INSTINET SALE

abstract.p: Reuters decides to sell shares in its electronic trading subsidiary, Instinet (S)

block.p: The British media company Reuters said it had decided to proceed with an initial sale of shares in Instinet, its electronic trading subsidiary, although it did not specify the size or a date of the proposed offering. Reuters also said third-quarter sales rose 16 percent, to $:888 million, or about $1.29 billion. Instinet sales rose 46 percent, to $:189 million, or about $276 million.
